title: SolidAngle MayaToArnold MtoA v0.25.2 For Maya 2012 2013 2013.5 2
description:
SolidAngle Maya To Arnold (MtoA) v0.25.2 For Maya Ã¢â‚¬â€œ x64

ArnoldRender is the famous photorealistic rendering system Ã¢â‚¬Å“Unbiased Monte Carlo Radiosity,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ currently used by Sony, Glassworks, Sega, Framestore, Digital Domain, The Mill, Psyop, Ubisoft, Zinkia, Kandor, 737 shaker among others, for advertising, animation series and movies like MonsterÃ‚Â´s House, Beowulf, Alice in Wonderland, 2012 o Lluvia de albÃƒÂ³ndigas and more.

This version uses the Arnold 4.0.16.0 core.

Highlighted New Features

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Support for multiple UV sets (#398).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Optimized geometry storage. Certain types of meshes now require less memory thanks to improved mesh compression.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Added a photometric light (#1161). See details.( Content visible to registered users Only ! Click here to Register !)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Added an Arnold shelf (#1286).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Added an option string to pass parameters to Kick with the Export Ass and Kick render type(#1288).

Notes
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Environment variables are now properly expanded for aiImage at translation time.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢MtoA can now export relative paths for textures. We export them as relative paths using the texture search path and also append the sourceImages folder automatically to this texture search path. That means if you are trying to use relative paths with tokens (they are stored as relative paths, since maya is not able to resolve the relative path to an absolute because of the tokens), they will work fine both with aiImage and Mayafile).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢MtoA can now export relative paths for procedurals. We export them as relative paths using the procedural search path.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢The Shave and a Haircut extension is now packaged separately. To create a pack from the source use the shavepack target.

Incompatible changes
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Due to the change in the negative scaling in aiSky and aiSkyDomeLight, old scenes can render different.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Improvements to the physical sky could break old scenes using it.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Maya fluids look can differ from previous versions due to changes done in how fluid scaling were affecting density and the support of fluid shader content method usage

Plugin Support:-

- Maya 2012, Linux, Darwin, & Windows 64 bit
- Maya 2013, Linux, Darwin, & Windows 64 bit
- Maya 2013.5, Linux, Darwin, & Windows 64 bit
- Maya 2014, Linux, Darwin, & Windows 64 bit
